description: Transitions between different callers during the show

lines.text: Fascinating stuff. Let's see who else is on the line.
lines.voiceText: Fascinating stuff. Let's see who else is on the line.

lines.text: Alright, we've got more callers waiting. Let's keep this going.
lines.voiceText: Alright, we've got more callers waiting. Let's keep this going.

lines.text: The board's lighting up tonight! Let's go to our next caller!
lines.voiceText: The board's lighting up tonight! Let's go to our next caller!

lines.text: Interesting call. But we've got more stories to hear. Next caller, you're on.
lines.voiceText: Interesting call. But we've got more stories to hear. Next caller, you're on.

lines.text: More callers in the queue. Let's see what else is out there.
lines.voiceText: More callers in the queue. Let's see what else is out there.

lines.text: That's what I love about this show - you never know what's coming next. Speaking of which...
lines.voiceText: That's what I love about this show - you never know what's coming next. Speaking of which...

lines.text: Additional callers are waiting. Proceeding to next interaction.
lines.voiceText: Additional callers are waiting. Proceeding to next interaction.

lines.text: *yawn* Alright, let's... move on to our next caller. I think.
lines.voiceText: *yawn* Alright, let's... move on to our next caller. I think.

lines.text: We've got another caller on the line... somewhere.
lines.voiceText: We've got another caller on the line... somewhere.

lines.text: *grunt* Next caller, you're on.
lines.voiceText: *grunt* Next caller, you're on.

lines.text: Alright, let's get to the next one. Hello?
lines.voiceText: Alright, let's get to the next one. Hello?

lines.text: Alright... next caller.
lines.voiceText: Alright... next caller.

lines.text: We've got another one waiting.
lines.voiceText: We've got another one waiting.

lines.text: Next caller, go ahead.
lines.voiceText: Next caller, go ahead.

lines.text: Let's move on. You're on the air.
lines.voiceText: Let's move on. You're on the air.

lines.text: Alright, next caller! Let's hear what you've got – and it better be good!
lines.voiceText: Alright, next caller! Let's hear what you've got – and it better be good!

lines.text: We've got another caller – don't waste my time!
lines.voiceText: We've got another caller – don't waste my time!

lines.text: Next one! Speak up!
lines.voiceText: Next one! Speak up!

lines.text: Alright, you're on – make it count!
lines.voiceText: Alright, you're on – make it count!

lines.text: *sigh* Alright, next caller.
lines.voiceText: *sigh* Alright, next caller.

lines.text: We've got another one. Go ahead.
lines.voiceText: We've got another one. Go ahead.

lines.text: Next caller, please.
lines.voiceText: Next caller, please.

lines.text: Alright, let's get this over with.
lines.voiceText: Alright, let's get this over with.

lines.text: Alright, next caller – tell me how this connects!
lines.voiceText: Alright, next caller – tell me how this connects!

lines.text: We've got another truth-seeker – what's the link?
lines.voiceText: We've got another truth-seeker – what's the link?

lines.text: Next one! The patterns await!
lines.voiceText: Next one! The patterns await!

lines.text: Alright, you're on – connect the dots for me!
lines.voiceText: Alright, you're on – connect the dots for me!

lines.text: NEXT CALLER! LET'S HEAR WHAT YOU'VE GOT – THE ENERGY IS BUILDING!
lines.voiceText: NEXT CALLER! LET'S HEAR WHAT YOU'VE GOT – THE ENERGY IS BUILDING!

lines.text: WE'VE GOT ANOTHER ONE! SPEAK UP – THE TRUTH WON'T WAIT!
lines.voiceText: WE'VE GOT ANOTHER ONE! SPEAK UP – THE TRUTH WON'T WAIT!

lines.text: NEXT! TELL ME EVERYTHING – I'M BURSTING WITH CURIOSITY!
lines.voiceText: NEXT! TELL ME EVERYTHING – I'M BURSTING WITH CURIOSITY!

lines.text: ALRIGHT, YOU'RE ON! LET'S UNEARTH SOME MORE SECRETS!
lines.voiceText: ALRIGHT, YOU'RE ON! LET'S UNEARTH SOME MORE SECRETS!
